analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na dassanena pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca dassanena pahātabba hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā chabbīsa, ārammaṇe ekavīsa, adhipatiyā aṭṭhārasa …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate chabbīsa.
analyzed: hetuyā chabbīsa ārammaṇe ekavīsa adhipatiyā aṭṭhārasa pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate chabbīsa
